ManageCondo is a full service property management company dedicated to helping short-term rental hosts maximize their rental opportunities. Maybe you are out of town, busy at the office, or unable to meet guests, manageCondo is here to meet, greet and get your guests settled in to your place. We are a team of experienced short-term rental hosts who understand the art of hospitality. 

From key exchange to full service management, We will be there for you every step of the way. ManageCondo is committed to revolutionize the hospitality industry. Managecondo is where expectations mean standardization. 

Every ManageCondo comes with a equipped kitchen, high speed wi-fi, complimentary toiletries, and all the necessary amenities you would need.

Contact Us To Learn More.

No smoking. No pets. Tenant will be required to pay for Hydro.

A six million dollar, 30,000 sq ft Super Club is one of the biggest reasons why residents chose to live in Harbourview Estates. This complex comprises of over 1500 suites in four towers, some reaching 49 storeys high and a cluster of townhomes, are located in the heart of the downtown core, next to the skydome and CN Tower. The recreational and exercise facility is unrivalled by any other condominium in the city. Spanning 80 metres in length, the Super Club offers an impressive inventory of amenities for both active and passive activities. Amenities include a 25-metre swimming pool, a full-size gymnasium, jogging track, whirlpool, cardio, weight and conditioning rooms, a squash court, bowling lanes, a billiards room and an outdoor tennis court. For the passive athlete an outdoor tanning platform, 20 person theatre, an indoor golf simulator, a karaoke room, an Internet cafe and a juice bar. The Super Club has become more like a community center enabling residents to easily meet one another over swimming lessons, basketball tournaments or spin class. The best part - all these amenities are included in the maintenance fees. Suite features are contemporary in style, with floor to ceilings windows, equipped with gas stoves.

Beautiful 1 Bachelor + 1 Solarium on 19th Floor. 
495 Sq Ft. 
All Utilities Are Included. 
View: Solarium with window Facing South. 
Move in: January 20th, 2018 . 
Lease Term: 1 Year 

Energetic amenities: Residents at College Park North Tower are all members of the Parkview Club, an 18,000 square-foot recreation centre replete with exercise facilities, multiple game rooms, a yoga studio, as well as a full indoor lap pool and relaxing whirlpool. You'll have no shortage of ways to stay active and live energized, all from the comfort of home. 

Convenient TTC access: One of the top bonuses of College Park North Tower is the building's direct underground access to College Street Station on the Yonge-University subway line. Accessed through the College Park Mall, a historical commercial space that features a 24-hour Metro, residents at South Tower will definitely appreciate this short-cut to their daily travels, especially during wintertime. 



What's Nearby 

At 763 Bay Street you'll find all that Toronto has to offer right outside your door. A few blocks north on Bloor Street you'll find fashionable boutique shopping, on Yonge Street you'll discover fun nightlife adventures, the Eaton Centre is close by, as is Queen Street shopping and entertainment, and the Financial District. A few local restaurants to try are Richtree Natural Market Restaurant on Yonge Street, Mercatto on College Street, and Adega on Elm Street for Iberian inspired seafood. 

For groceries and other household needs you are directly connected to the College Park Mall where you will find a 24-hour Metro, as well there is a Loblaws, Bulk Barn, and Sobeys all along College Street near Yonge. 

For some local green space, College Park North Tower is only a short walk from Queen's Park, a lovely space to bicycle, roller-blade, exercise outdoors, or sit under a tree and read. 



Getting Around 

The Bay St. Corridor area has a 99 Walk Score, with bike lanes along College and Wellesley Streets. There are TTC options on Bay Street, College Street, and access to the Yonge-University subway line is just a short walk. If you drive, you can zip onto the Gardiner Expressway via York Street, and the Don Valley Parkway is via Danforth Avenue.

 Description: Siesta Beach House Condominium 1st (Ground) Floor unit.
 Siesta Beach House is located BEACHSIDE, no need to cross the road to get to the beach.
 A heated swimming pool, shuffleboard, charcoal BBQ's, and a private beach with lounges and chairs are provided for your enjoyment.
 This particular unit has been completely refurbished and is better equipped than many condos costing twice as much to rent.
 Everything is New, new walls, ceiling, floors, kitchen, bath, bedroom and living room.
 Have a look at some of the pictures below and on our own website (Link above).
 This condo is only 200 yards from the beach with NO ROAD to cross.
 There is an assigned parking spot, just in front, for this condo. 
Siesta Key has numerous FREE shuttle rides to restaurants, bars etc. Just Google "Siesta Key Free Rides" to see the options. 

 Amenities:
 The condo is fully air-conditioned with Diagonal Porcelain Tile & Carpets throughout. There are ceiling fans in the Living Room and Bedroom. It is equipped with two cordless telephones. The Comcast telephone service includes FREE long distance to USA & Canada as well as call display, call waiting and call answer.
 The Living Room contains a queen size sofa-bed and a love seat. For your entertainment there is a 32"HDTV with a X1 HD Cable Box with PVR and a stereo radio with iPod Dock. We now have a Sony 3200 Smart WiFi Blu-Ray player. Bring your Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu etc login and watch your programming. A Canon MG-3520 AirPrint-WiFi printer has been added to allow you to print from your computer, tablet or phone. Download MG-3520 drivers/apps (canon.com/ijsetup) before you come.
 Now with FREE High Speed WiFi Internet Connection Inside the condo.
 Next to the living room is a large kitchen with dining table and four chairs. The kitchen is fully equipped with a large frost free fridge with Icemaker, self cleaning stove with ceramic top, over the range microwave, toaster oven, dishwasher, garburator and all the latest kitchen gadgets, along with a full set of dishes, glasses and pots and pans.
 The bedroom contains a queen size bed along with a chair, a large set of drawers and 2 night tables. There is a 19" remote control TV with DVD player, a ceiling fan, a telephone and a clock radio. There is a large walk-in closet to store your clothes and suitcases. We have added a small user programmable safe to store your valuables (At your risk)
 The New 4 piece bathroom has a sink, shower/bathtub and an elongated toilet.
 A new high efficiency heating and cooling system can maintain a temperature to keep you comfortable.
 This unit is a NON smoking unit. Condo Board and Health rules do not allow pets.
 Virtually everything you need is supplied, all you need to bring is yourself, suntan lotion, beach towels and food.
 If you require any further information don't hesitate to call or e-mail us.

 (Gulf of Mexico) Siesta/Crescent Beach, Siesta Key, Sarasota, Florida 34242

 Crescent Beach on Siesta Key is the world's best beach and we don't say that lightly. While some say beaches in Bali, Australia, New Zealand and/or Hawaii are as nice it's not the case - We've been there.
 NO OTHER BEACH IN THE WORLD IS AS CLEAN, WHITE SAND, COOL ON THE HOTTEST DAYS, AND SAFE TO SWIM IN AS CRESCENT BEACH !!!

 Travel Channel Rates Siesta Beach to the "Elite List": On April 6, 2003 a Travel Channel (Part of Discovery Networks) film crew shot footage on the beach. Siesta Beach was chosen to the "Elite" list by a panel of beach experts reviewing criteria such as cleanliness, sand quality and surrounding area. The secret of Siesta Key's sand is that the ancient sand crystals have been worn smooth over time. The sand is clean, powder soft to the touch, free of shell particles and cool on the feet. This is not the first time that Siesta Beach has won an award. In a USA Today poll Siesta Beach was voted one of the 3 top USA beaches. Conde Nast Traveler Magazine ranked Siesta Beach as being one of the "Best of the Best" in 1999. In 1987 the Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution gave Siesta Beach the designation of having the "Whitest, Finest Beach Sand in the World", a title that still stands today. Siesta Beach was selected "TOP Mainland USA Beach" by Dr. Beach in 2008 and 2011.

 The building is about 200 yards from the private beach equipped with lounges and chairs. There is no road to cross to get to the beach.

 Many golf courses (50+) are available for you to play within 30-45 minutes drive. Prices are reasonable, even in High Season, with 18 holes and cart from $40 and up tax included.

 Sarasota is located about 1 hour south of Tampa/St.Petersburg on the West coast of Florida on beautiful Gulf of Mexico.
 There are numerous International airports close to Sarasota.
 In Sarasota is the Sarasota/Bradenton (SRQ) International airport.
 Tampa(TPA)/St. Petersburg(PIE) is located about 1 hour north on I-75.
 Orlando(MCO)/Sanford(SFB) is about 2 hours northeast on I-75 & I-4.
 Ft. Myers(RSW) is about 75 minutes south on I-75.
 Fort Lauderdale(FLL) and Miami(MIA) are about 3 hours southeast on I-75.
 If you are going to rent a car then just fly into the airport that gives you the least expensive Total Price.
 For you in the colder North, St. Petersburg or Tampa is usually the cheapest.

I am looking for a clean and respectful  FEMALE in her 20s-30s to sublet the second bedroom (2.75 m x 3.48 m) in a 2 bed 2 bath luxury condo suite (900sqft). 

$1000 per month. Rent does not include electricity.

First and last month rent upon move-in; 200$ security (key and damage) deposit 
*security deposit will be returned to you upon moving out.
Proof of employment and/or reference letters required.

The recently painted second bedroom is very spacious. It is carpeted and has plenty of closet space. The room will come with a newly bought full size mattress and bed frame.

If you need, I can provide you a desk, chair and nightstand (no extra cost).

The split bedroom design offers plenty of privacy. The shared living space is fully furnished and tastefully decorated. Some notable luxuries include: a luxury custom-made modern sofa, a 42" TV, gourmet kitchen, microwave, ensuite laundry and dryer. 

Steps to TTC Finch subway station (2 minutes), GO transit, VIVA - (YRT) York Region transit. 20-30 minutes bus ride to York University. The building has many amenities including a gym, indoor pool, screen golf, billiard room, 24-hr concierge, BBQ and patio area, and guest suites. Parking can be rented out from other owners in the building. (Ads on the first floor)

International students, graduate students, post-docs, visiting academics, short term contract professionals are preferred. 

Thank you for your time and consideration. Please send me an email with descriptions of yourself if you are interested.

About me: You will be sharing the two bedroom unit with me. I am a female postdoctoral researcher at a university who works/writes from home a lot. I am easy going, sociable, and quiet. I enjoy drinking a glass of wine once or twice a week but I am not a party person. I like to keep the house clean and quiet.

With Historical charm One of the real treats of  renting downtown Toronto condos is the potential for historic connection. The Waldorf Astoria Lofts, originally built in the 1960's, is one of those select properties that offer residences not only a fully modern home but also a link to Toronto's past. So if you like the idea of a charming building full of stories and memories, then The Waldorf Astoria Lofts might be the place to add your own.

Friendly vibe along Charles Street East, a quaint, tree-lined street with a mix of established homes and new up-and-coming developments. Only a short walk from Church Street, the neighbourhood is fun and friendly, perfect for evening strolls, easy trips to Yonge Street and the Eaton Centre, or simply staying home with the songs of birds in the trees.

Fitness facilities: Rare among Toronto lofts, The Waldorf Astoria Lofts offer residences a fitness facility replete with a sauna and a rooftop deck. For those who are short of time or finances to join an outside gym, these amenities will make it easy and relaxing to stay active during the winter months.

With an historic loft home at 80 Charles Street East, you will live just a short walk from one of Toronto's most popular intersections. The Yonge and Bloor neighbourhood offers an exciting mosaic of the downtown living experience, with the central TTC junction pulling it all together. You will enjoy a smooth blend of business, fashion, artistry, and entertainment, from Yonge Street nightlife and cultural events to Bloor Street restaurants and cafes, Yorkville boutique shopping, and Bay Street business bustle.

Building has Courtyard access with BBQ, and Gym.

When you live at 16 Brookers Lane, there's never a shortage of things to do and places to go.

Just outside of the front door of the building, you can grab a sub or some sushi, get your dry cleaning done, get a tan or get your nails done, grab a coffee or ice cream, or even take your dog or cat to the vet.  You can walk to the lakefront trail and snap a selfie on the Humber Bay bridge, or ride your bike all the way to the Exhibition grounds.

The Farmer's Market is just down the street, and there's a yearly Waterfront Festival as well.  Just a short distance away, you'll find hundreds of local shops along the Lakeshore.

Inside the building, there's even more to do.  Whether you choose to go for a swim, hit the sauna, watch a movie in the theatre, or have a BBQ on the rooftop terrace, you'll enjoy the amenities in the building on a regular basis.

The unit is a one-bedroom, 574 square feet plus an extra 135 square feet of balcony space.  The high nine-foot ceilings and large south-facing windows with lake views will provide enjoyment every day.  There's one parking space close to the elevator, and one locker included with the condo.

The building is pet-friendly, with a wide mix of residents from singles to young families.  There's easy access to highways and transit, with a more relaxed pace compared to downtown.  But if you want to get there, it won't take long at all when you live in this super convenient location.

Enjoy everything this condo unit, building and area have to offer you!

WEEKLY and MONTHLY Toronto furnished condo for rent across from the SICK KIDS HOSPITAL and near Toronto General and Princess Margaret Hospitals at discounted rates. 



Fully furnished 1 bedroom 1 bathroom condo apartments (sleep up to 4 people) are available immediately from as low as $132.95 per night and up on select nights (from $3,988.50 per month and up). Weekly rates are higher.



VERY SPACIOUS 2 bedroom 2 bathroom plus den Family Size condo apartments (sleep up to 6 people) are available immediately from as low as $161 per night and up on select nights (From $4,850.00 per month and up). Weekly rates are higher.



All suites are tastefully furnished and designer decorated and feature large walkout balconies, in suite washer and dryer machines and fully equipped kitchens. All suites are equipped with an ultra premium top of the line Simmons Queen size bed and a Fireplace in each bedroom, and 2 double sofa beds in the living room. All suites feature 2 Plasma LCD TVs with premium cable. 1 bedroom suites can sleep up to 4 people. 2 bedroom suites can sleep up to 6 people. Our suites are located near public transit (TTC) stop in the heart of Downtown Toronto at Bay and College across from the College Park Center near Sick Kids Hospital, Toronto General Hospital, Mount Sinai Hospital, Princess Margaret Hospital.







Toronto has a wealth of various types of exquisite accommodations If you are coming to Toronto for an extended stay or searching for permanent housing, you have to consider how much you can spend on accommodations.



If you are coming to Toronto for an extended stay or searching for permanent housing, you have to consider how much you can spend on accommodations. Staying at a hotel can result in a very expensive accommodation bill. For many people, staying in a short term rental furnished apartment is a popular choice. These apartments provide guests with all of the luxuries of a hotel except they provide a home-away-from-home environment. The prices are much more affordable than a hotel and they are available for weekly or monthly stays. 



Short term furnished apartments rentals provide conveniences and comforts of home. They contain lavish bedrooms, completely functional kitchens, spacious and decorated rooms, quality security features, and laundry services.



As an alternative to staying in a hotel, more people are choosing to rent short term furnished apartments.Toronto is a wonderful place to visit and live. Make the most out of your stay by choosing Canada Suites - the leading provider of Toronto Furnished Rentals. 



Not only are the nightly rates much less with Canada Suites than the cost of a hotel, you don't have the added expenses of dining out, local calls, high long distance surcharges (Canada Suites guests can call anywhere in North America FREE of charge), and laundry services. Find tastefully decorated, thoughtfully furnished apartments in Toronto at www.CanadaSuites.com.

Toronto has a wealth of various types of exquisite accommodations If you are coming to Toronto for an extended stay or searching for permanent housing, you have to consider how much you can spend on accommodations.



If you are coming to Toronto for an extended stay or searching for permanent housing, you have to consider how much you can spend on accommodations. Staying at a hotel can result in a very expensive accommodation bill. For many people, staying in a short term rental furnished apartment is a popular choice. These apartments provide guests with all of the luxuries of a hotel except they provide a home-away-from-home environment. The prices are much more affordable than a hotel and they are available for weekly or monthly stays. 



Short term furnished apartments rentals provide conveniences and comforts of home. They contain lavish bedrooms, completely functional kitchens, spacious and decorated rooms, quality security features, and laundry services.



As an alternative to staying in a hotel, more people are choosing to rent short term furnished apartments.Toronto is a wonderful place to visit and live. Make the most out of your stay by choosing Canada Suites - the leading provider of Toronto Short Term Rentals - as rated by independent reviewers on the worlds largest traveler's website. 



Not only are the nightly rates much less with Canada Suites than the cost of a hotel, you don't have the added expenses of dining out, local calls, high long distance surcharges, laundry services and pay movies. Find tastefully decorated, thoughtfully furnished apartments in Toronto at www.CanadaSuites.com.

View the virtual tour for this property here: http://unbranded.mediatours.ca/property/1502-20-blue-jays-way-toronto

This spacious, 1,000 sq ft 2 bedroom plus den, 2 bathroom, unfurnished suite on the 15th floor at 20 Blue Jays Way is not to be missed. 

With an open plan concept, the gourmet kitchen with chef's island connects the main living areas including the separate dining and living room. Enjoy city views from the balcony accessible from the living room.

The two main bedrooms are on opposite sides of the living space allowing for privacy when needed. The Master bedroom enjoys its own ensuite. The guest bathroom includes a tub.

The suite features wooden floors throughout, with tiled kitchen, dining and washrooms. Whirlpool appliances include Fridge, Dishwasher, Microwave, Washer and Dryer units.

You'll enjoy coming home to The Element at 20 Blue Jays Way with its grand entrance, 24 hour concierge and security access. 

Style is the main focus of The Element. 
- Enjoy The Elements' Billiards and cards room. These rooms effortlessly marry the old rustic pool-hall setting with chic modern furniture and interior design. 
- The two-storey lobby, the athletics centre, the lounge spaces, and the aqua-spa areas are all tastefully decorated for optimal space and an inviting atmosphere. Even the Jacuzzi faces a perfectly placed window so you can relax in style, overlooking the whole world. 
- Additionally, enjoy the benefits of the Enwave Water System: The Element uses an Enwave Deep Lake Water Cooling System to assist in the heating and cooling of the building. This system takes water from Lake Ontario and pumps it through various parts of the building, creating an eco-friendly practice that reduces the impact to the environment and the burden to your wallet.

Minimum lease is 12 months.

Suite Features: 
- 2 bedrooms
- 1 den
- 2 bathrooms
- Balcony with city views
- Parking
- Storage
- Whirlpool appliances

Building Features:

- Steps to the TIFF Bell Lightbox
- Easy access to the Gardener Expressway, Public Transit and the UP Express to Pearson.

This property is professionally managed by Toronto Luxury Rentals.

In the heart of downtown Toronto, The L Tower is the evolution of 21st century living. An iconic landmark designed by celebrated architects, the residential tower rises 57 storeys and is home to 600 suites with high-end luxurious finishes. The exquisite interiors feature signature Munge Leung designed kitchen cabinetry, engineered hardwood flooring, stainless steel kitchen appliance package, granite kitchen countertop, marble bathroom countertop, 9-ft ceiling heights and more. Spectacular condo amenities include catering kitchen for residents and their guests, library, private cinema, lounge, gym and spa facilities and a 24-hour concierge.

This modern unit for lease is a stunning 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite on the 50th floor. With just under 1100 square feet of living space, this condo comes fully furnished and equipped with everything you need including a 58" Flat Screen LED Television and top of the line coffee and espresso machines. Enjoy the unit's luxurious designs and high end appliances, and take in the most remarkable views of the city skyline, as well as the Harbourfront. All utilities, as well as premium cable and internet are included in the listing price. Parking is also included.

This property is professionally managed by Toronto Luxury Rentals. Please call  
 to learn more or to arrange a private showing.

1 Bedroom + den and 2 full washrooms in the heart of downtown Toronto. very near to entertainment district, rogers center, cn tower, CNE and downtown airport. Walk to lake shore and a lot of eateries down the building.

The LTD Condos at 15 Bruyeres Mews was completed in 2012 and was designed by the renowned local architects at ArchitectsAlliance, Quadrangle Architects as well as the cutting-edge firm of RAW Design.

Bordering onto Bathurst St., LTD Condos by Malibu, is a boutique style condo in the Fort York neighbourhood. It stands at 15 storeys high, houses a comfortable 199 residential homes and boasts a fifth-floor, south-west facing roof-top terrace on the podium-level. Located beside its sister Malibu at 600 Fleet to the south, LTD Condo at 15 Bruyeres Mews offers a unique and stylish space for living with easy access to transit, the highways, the lake shore and many nearby amenities. Conveniently close to downtown, LTD also stands for Living Totally Downtown. The entertainment district and the downtown business district are only minutes away. The architects Quadrangle and RAW Design in Toronto are known for their innovation of design with a concentration on making living spaces in cities that revolve around European style of community living.

Welcome to Horseshoe Valley, just one hour north of Toronto, a "must visit" four-season natural outdoor recreation playground with rolling hills and a beautiful country setting. Carriage Hills Resort is physically located in the township of Oro-Medonte, Ontario in Simcoe County, and is part of the BruceGreySimcoe tourism region.

In the winter, the area transforms into a winter wonderland with fresh crisp air, scenic vistas, four downhill resorts, great snowshoeing, cross country and snowmobiling trails. Other season activities include cycling the hills and curves of our back roads, gliding over the treetops on a Zipline or golfing at the many premier golf courses. Experience world class music festivals at Burl's Creek Event Grounds or explore the mysteries of a cave; chill out at a spa in Collingwood. Or on a hot sizzling day visit Wasaga Beach, the world's longest fresh water beach in the world!

Features & Amenities:
Ideal Ontario resort location north of Toronto in Horseshoe Valley
Eighteen area golf courses nearby - 2 minute drive Settler's Golf Club
Easy access to Hardwood Ski and Bike, a perfect destination for Cross country skiing, Snowshoeing & Mountain biking enthusiasts - 10 minute drive
Surrounded by the Copeland Forest for a guided ATV tour or Hummer ride, Mountain biking, Cycling or Hiking
Ski-in/Ski-out accommodations on the ridge of Horseshoe Resort hills (Carriage Ridge Resort only) - 2 minute drive for (Carriage Hills Resort) guests
The Heights Ski and Country Club - 4 minute drive
A 15 minute drive to Mount St. Louis Ski Resort
For premier gaming and entertainment visit Casino Rama - 25 minutes away from the resort
Horseshoe Slopeside Adventures featuring Climbing Wall, Chairlift ride, Euro Bungy, Hiking & Biking rails, Mini Putt, Inflatable Obstacle, Maze, Zipline ride. Open during the summer months only.
Spacious condominium accommodations, full kitchens, gas fireplaces and over-sized jetted tubs (1-and 2-bedrooms)
Studio units (sink, toaster, coffee-maker, under mount counter bar-fridge, microwave only)
All rooms are configured with king size beds and queen size sleeper beds.
Semi-Private laundry (private for a 2-bedroom)
All rooms have covered balconies
Free parking
High Speed WiFi Internet Access (Complimentary)
Heated indoor swimming pool only, children's pool, indoor hot tub, and outdoor patio (Carriage Ridge Resort Guests use only)
Heated indoor/outdoor swimming pool (year round), indoor sauna and outdoor hot tub (Carriage Hills Resort Guests use only)
Fitness room
Onsite Daily Activities (Complimentary, unless otherwise noted $ on activities guide).
Billiards and games
Concierge services
Children's playground
BBQ pavilions (seasonal)
In-suite aesthetic treatments and massage therapy $
Important Information About Accessible Needs:
Accessibility units are available (very limited) and are located on the ground floors and have easy wheelchair access sleeping up to a maximum of 8 people (bed-sharing basis). Includes 1 roll in shower, one over-sized jetted tub (not modified), modified kitchen, lower light switches and wider doors for easier access. Unit has a living room, dining area and two bedrooms with two king beds and 2 sleeper sofas.

The Condo 

Jubilee is part of a 46-story, glass/concrete highrise called the Festival Tower located at the intersection of King and John. It is part of the Bell Lightbox complex, and the state of the art building has world class amenities. 

With 600 square feet of floor space, and 100 sq feet of balcony space, Jubilee is great for entertaining.  It is a very spacious 1 bedroom with an amazing layout. This suite features an east view, giving you an amazing view of the financial district, the CN tower, and a north view of the rest of the city! This gives you the true feeling of a castle in the sky. 

With floor to ceiling windows, lots of living and everything you could want in terms of amenities, there is nothing this condo doesn't have.

No expense was spared on this very modern unit!  It features granite counters, matched hidden Miele appliances, tile bathroom floors, hardwood flooring throughout, 10 foot ceilings, and so much more!  This unit is the creme de la creme, and will truly take your breath away.

The area surrounding the condo 

Located in King West on John Street, Jubilee is perfectly located to offer its residents the very best of city living. Located right at the intersection of King and John in the Festival Tower, residents can take advantage of some of the best restaurants, shopping and entertainment. 

The Festival Tower is part of the Bell Lightbox complex, which houses the Toronto International Film Festival, or TIFF.  During other times, the Bell Lightbox has numerous movies playing in their world class cinemas, as well as shopping and three different restaurants to choose from for the discriminating diner.

A stroll south down King Street leads to numerous restaurants, world renowned theaters such as the Princess of Wales or the Roy Thompson Hall, while a walk south takes residents to Front Street, which is home to the Metro Toronto Convention Centre, with the Rogers Centre and Air Canada Centre just to the south of that.  With Queen West just to the north, residents will be surrounded by and endless array of things to do.

To travel further afield in an environmentally friendly way, residents also have access to the TTC along King Street via streetcar, as well as subway at the University line, which is about 5 minutes walk to the east.

Library District Condos at 170 Fort York Blvd was completed in 2014. The contemporary-designed and environmentally-conscious 29 storey residential structure is an eye-catching site within the Fort York community. It gets its name in the celebration of the City of Toronto's 99th public library, located next door.
The unique colored glass architecture of the building exterior is inspired by the abundant green spaces of Historical Fort York located across the street, as well as the abstraction of books lining a shelf. Residents enjoy the Author's Club, a three-level pavilion with views overlooking the park.
Along with stunning balcony views of Lake Ontario and Downtown, residents have easy access to grocery stores, fine dining and taking in everything Toronto offers nearby, such as the Rogers Centre, Air Canada Centre, Harbor Front and Billy Bishop Airport.

If you are coming to Toronto for an extended stay or searching for permanent housing, you have to consider how much you can spend on accommodations. Staying at a hotel can result in a very expensive accommodation bill. For many people, staying in a short term rental furnished apartment is a popular choice. These apartments provide guests with all of the luxuries of a hotel except they provide a home-away-from-home environment. The prices are much more affordable than a hotel and they are available for weekly or monthly stays. 



Short term furnished apartments rentals provide all of the comforts and conveniences of a modern home. They contain lavish bedrooms, completely functional kitchens, spacious and decorated rooms, quality security features, and laundry services.



As an alternative to staying in a hotel, more people are choosing to rent short term furnished apartments.Toronto is a wonderful place to visit and live.

Welcome to your new Waterclub Condominium condo in the heart of trendy Harboufront! The high end, modern finishes and stunning waterfront view is sure to blow you away.

When you first walk in you are immediately flooded by the natural light cascading through the wall-to-wall windows. You will surly be inspired to cook up some delicious creations in your great new kitchen - equipped with tons of storage, large fridge, stove, and microwave!

Wash away the stress of a long day in your bright new bathroom. Featuring a soaker tub, crisp white tiles and great lighting, you will be feeling relaxed in no time!

Your cozy new bedroom is the perfect place to wind down and crack open a good book. This bedroom features high ceilings, a good sized closet and modern finishing's. This unit is the perfect getaway! Come check it out for yourself and be prepared to be blown away!

You are also just steps away from posh designer boutiques; hip lounges and fantastic restaurants!

Enjoy spectacular King West lifestyle in this fabulous 1150sf corner suite at Toronto's Citysphere.

The newly renovated designer kitchen features custom wooden cabinetry above sleek granite counter-tops and a subway tile backslash. High-end stainless steel appliances include dishwasher, fridge, freezer, microwave, and electric range. Tiled floors and bright lighting complete the kitchen area.

Boasting a large living/dining space, the living room is anchored with a built-in TV entertainment unit. Watch TV or Netflix on the flat screen television, with plenty of storage for your Apple TV, Xbox, and anything you might want to show off in the vast display cases. The cozy living room is completed with a leather couch, love seat, coffee table, end table, and an area rug. A high table and 4 leather chairs provide plenty of room for meals.

Continue walking through the large condo and you'll enter the den, which currently holds an upright piano keyboard, bookshelf, and area rug. The den boasts beautiful views of Toronto's southern waterfront. You can even watch the planes take off from Billy Bishop airport -- but you won't hear a thing!

Just beside the den is the second bedroom, which also makes a great home office. This room comes with an optional desk and bookshelf.

The large master bedroom has a queen size bed, 2 night stands, 2 dressers, and 2 large closets (the bedroom can easily accommodate a king size bed). The bedroom faces south and you'll wake up to beautiful views of the city. Just past the double sliding closets, you'll enter the ensuite bathroom, complete with tub, shower, vanity, and plenty of cabinet space.

Keep walking out of your master bedroom and you'll find a second full washroom, more closet space, and a laundry room complete with stacked washer/dryer.

Citysphere offers residents the best in building amenities including a 24 hr gym, rooftop patio, whirlpool, party room, steam room, and more!

The Yards at Fort York condominium at 20 Bruyeres Mews is developed by the Onni Group, an award-winning family-owned-and-operated company. They are Vancouver-based quality builder in business for half a century and known for their building design, innovation, superior quality and customer service. Onni teamed up with highly respected architect, Rudy Wallman and Associates of Toronto to design theYards at Fort York condo. Interior Design is by II BY IV Design Associates. The building is currently under construction.

Building Information

The Yards Condo at Fort York is a sleek 28 storey tower of glass and steel offering panoramic views of Lake Ontario, downtown Toronto and the north and western edges of the city. It boasts a rooftop terrace with a unique urban agricultural garden on top of the sixth-floor podium; and, at street level, there is over 5000 sq ft of retail shopping along Bathurst St. Designed with sophistication and smarts in mind, The Yards at Fort York offers a welcome feeling to come home to. Library District Condos at 170 Fort York Blvd was completed in 2014. The contemporary-designed and environmentally-conscious 29 storey residential structure is an eye-catching site within the Fort York community. It gets its name in the celebration of the City of Toronto's 99th public library, located next door.
The unique colored glass architecture of the building exterior is inspired by the abundant green spaces of Historical Fort York located across the street, as well as the abstraction of books lining a shelf. Residents enjoy the Author's Club, a three-level pavilion with views overlooking the park.
Along with stunning balcony views of Lake Ontario and Downtown, residents have easy access to grocery stores, fine dining and taking in everything Toronto offers nearby, such as the Rogers Centre, Air Canada Centre, Harbor Front and Billy Bishop Airport.

Fully furnished 1 bedroom and large 2 bedroom 2 bathroom plus den luxury condos (sleep up to 6 people) are available immediately from as low as $132.95 per night and up (from $3,988.50 per month and up) for 1 bedroom condos. 





All suites are designer decorated and feature large walkout balconies, in suite laundry machines, fully equipped kitchens and are equipped with a Simmons Beautyrest Queen size bed and a Fireplace in the bedroom, 2 double sofa beds in the living room and 2 Plasma LCD TVs. 1 bedroom suites can sleep up to 4 people. 2 bedroom suites can sleep up to 6 people. The suites are located in the heart of Downtown Toronto at Bay and College near public transit (TTC) stop across from the College Park Center near the Sick Kids Hospital, Toronto General Hospital, Mount Sinai Hospital, Princess Margaret Hospital.







Toronto has a wealth of various types of exquisite accommodations If you are coming to Toronto for an extended stay or searching for permanent housing, you have to consider how much you can spend on accommodations.



If you are coming to Toronto for an extended stay or searching for permanent housing, you have to consider how much you can spend on accommodations. Staying at a hotel can result in a very expensive accommodation bill. For many people, staying in a short term rental furnished apartment is a popular choice. These apartments provide guests with all of the luxuries of a hotel except they provide a home-away-from-home environment. The prices are much more affordable than a hotel and they are available for weekly or monthly stays. 



Short term furnished apartments rentals provide luxury with the comforts of home. They contain lavish bedrooms, completely functional kitchens, spacious and decorated rooms, quality security features, and laundry services.



As an alternative to staying in a hotel, more people are choosing to rent short term furnished apartments.Toronto is a wonderful place to visit and live. Make the most out of your stay by choosing Canada Suites - the leading provider of Toronto Short Term Rentals - as rated by independent reviewers on the worlds largest traveler's website. 



Not only are the nightly rates much less with Canada Suites than the cost of a hotel, you don't have the added expenses of dining out, local calls, high long distance surcharges (our guests can call anywhere in North America FREE of charge), and laundry services. Find tastefully decorated, thoughtfully furnished apartments in Toronto at www.canadasuites.com.

 Marriott's Ko Olina Beach Club is situated on the Western shore of Oahu, where waterfalls, lush gardens and fountains welcome you. Just 30 minutes from Honolulu, this beach front oasis is secluded and peaceful. Surrounded by several lagoons, you will find brilliantly blue water all around you. From the stunning gardens to the sparkling pools, every inch is filled with beauty. The resort features several beautiful pools and ocean coves. Great walking along the beach walkway passing the finest resorts on Oahu.This resort is only 30 miles away from downtown Honolulu and all of the historical Military history sights of Pearl Harbor. 

 Each timeshare villa reflects the gracious, open hospitality of a Hawaiian plantation. With Koa wood furnishings and Hawaiian decor, your villa will create the perfect setting.Villas are purpose built timeshare units with full kitchens; laundry in suite; views of the ocean or the mountains. Nicely furnished and appointed. The Villas give the feeling of a premium apartment setting with wonderful views. 

 On-site at Marriott's Ko Olina Beach Club you will find four pools and whirlpools, a poolside bar and grill, Polynesian dinner show, children's activity center, a fitness center, The Marketplace convenience store, golf, a full-service marina with 270 slips, and a wedding chapel. Guests can also enjoy access to the JW Marriott Ihilani Resort & Spa, and Ko Olina Golf Club and Marina. 

 Ko Olina is a destination resort area with all of the amenities required for a wonderful and relaxing vacation. Venture out on your own, or follow the Ko Olina Beach Club's top ten things to do: sip your favorite drink at sunset, relive history at Pearl Harbor, feel the spray of Waikahalulu Falls, visit world-renowned Waikiki Beach, dine on sushi in Honolulu, stroll through the Honolulu Botanical Gardens, watch North Shore surfers, trek through mountain rainforests, hop into a helicopter for an extraordinary view, or snorkel, scuba, and windsurf.

I'm looking for a new housemate as my best friend is moving out of Toronto. Earliest move in date is February 1st 2018.

I'm ideally looking for a young professional like myself, someone who is social and has their own life, but may also be up for a beer every now and again. I'm a 24 year old graphic designer who works in Markham.

The apartment has excellent amenities, it's on the 5th floor with a great view of the lake and amazing sunrises. It's well equipped with a dishwasher and ensuite laundry machines.

The available room is spacious and has its own full en-suite bathroom as well as a walk-in closet. The shared living space is already fully furnished, although the bedroom will need new furniture (although my current housemate might be open to selling). 

Along with the apartment itself being great, you'll have access to a number of amenities: a gym, squash court, library/study area, hot tub, and in the summer, an outdoor pool! A few of these are located on the 4th floor terrace which is also equipped with a calisthenics equipment and a low impact walking strip for summer training, on top of that I have an electric bbq which I'd be happy to show you how to use (it's dead simple).

The building is a 15 minute walk to the GO station, a 10 minute walk to lakeshore as well as the buses accessible there, a 2 minute drive to the Gardiner, and a 1 minute drive to Metro, Shoppers and an LCBO. I honestly don't think it could have been located in a better place.

Rent is 900 per month, it's a 1 year contract, the landlord requires a letter of employment, credit check, as well as first and last.
